#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test,n,b;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        int count=0;
        while(n)
        {
            b=n;
            //cout<<(b&1)<<endl;
            if((b&1)!=0)
                break;
            count++;
            n=n>>1;
        }
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
}
